original_text: God is able to accept Israel's people back again. If they come to believe in Christ, God will put them back as part of the tree. He is able to make them become branches of the tree again. God is able to accept Israel's people back again. If they come to believe in Christ, God will put them back as part of the tree. He is able to make them become branches of the tree again.
korean_text: 그들도 믿지 아니하는 데 머무르지 아니하면 접붙임을 받으리니 이는 그들을 접붙이실 능력이 하나님께 있음이라

sentences.original_text: God is able to accept Israel's people back again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 이스라엘 백성들을 다시 받아들이실 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: If they come to believe in Christ,
God will put them back as part of the tree.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들을 나무의 일부로 돌려놓으실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He is able to make them become branches of the tree again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 다시 나무의 가지가 되게 하실 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: God is able to accept Israel's people back again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 이스라엘 백성들을 다시 받아들이실 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: If they come to believe in Christ,
God will put them back as part of the tree.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들을 나무의 일부로 돌려놓으실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He is able to make them become branches of the tree again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 다시 나무의 가지가 되게 하실 수 있습니다.
